remarks: It is sufficient to prove that the double orthocomplement is a subset of the target set to show that the set is a closed subspace.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cssss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cssss.c $e |- C = ( CSubSp ` W ) $.
ocvcss.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
iscss2 $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ S C_ V ) -> ( S e. C <-> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` S ) ) C_ S ) ) $.
